  • Rebuilding my Website with Jekyll and CSS Grid

    March 01 2018

    For years I have been struggling with wordpress and itâ€™s many plugins and themes. This lead me to slowly learn more and more HTML and CSS. I never liked the idea of coding a website from scratch. But when I learned about git I had this magnificent idea about how website templates could be built in github and then hosted directly from the repository and then everyone would be able to fork and submit pull requests for any website on the internet. Well, low and behold I learned about Github Pages a few years later and my prayers were answered.
